chief reporter of the Central Meteorological Station , Li Yanxiang , said that this is not because the weather forecast was inaccurate . people feel sultry because of high humidity .中央气象台首席预报员李延香今天说，这并不是气象部门预报的气温不准，人们普遍有闷热的感觉主要是因为湿度大。
